Trade/Device Name(s): Omega Laboratories Hair Drug Screening Assay for Cocaine and Cocaine Metabolites
Regulation Name(s): Cocaine and Cocaine Metabolite Test System
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Omega Laboratories Hair Drug Screening Assay using ELISA for qualitative detection of cocaine and metabolites in hair samples.
Indications for Use Summary: Qualitative detection of cocaine in human head hair at or above 500 pg/mg to identify cocaine use, for in-house laboratory service use only, not for sale.
